about_the_game:
[18+] The Exile of Aphrodisia 2023 is an adult transformation-themed game inspired by The Odyssey and The Oregon Trail.



One thousand years ago, the first humans crossed through a mysterious portal into a new magical world and settled on the island continent known as Aphrodisia. Now, however, humanity has just lost a war against the powerful Demon Empire and is being hunted down as slaves.

The last remaining hope for freedom is the ruined city of Niu Heym where, with any luck, at least some of your wards will be able to return to the humans' ancestral homeworld before the portal-gate closes for another thousand years.

You are an elf guide tasked with leading a small party of humans over a thousand kilometers west across all of Aphrodisia to the city of Niu Heym and the Portal Gate. With any luck, at least some of your wards will be able to return to the humans' ancestral homeworld before the portal gate runs out of rift charges. It is your job to try and get them there, but forces are acting against you, wishing to take some, or all, of your charges and to transform or enslave them.

This will be a long and dangerous trek… and you may not walk out on the same two feet! Are you up to the challenge?

FEATURES:

- Demo has 30 out of the 230+ choose-your-own-adventure-style encounters where party members can be transformed into elves, wildmen, animals, monsters, statues, clothes, fairies, dinosaurs, and much, much more
- 90+ afflictions, slow transformations that stay with party members, transforming them a little more bit by bit
- Demo has 6 out of the 25+ Fully illustrated player character transformations, complete with Instincts Kick-In events
- Unique epilogues for a victorious campaign, failures due to running out of rift charges, and failure due to losing all party members
- Party member customization: put yourself and your friends into the game and see what fate has in store for you, or if you'll be one of the lucky few to reach Niu Heym in your original body
- Hundreds of illustrations for encounters and afflictions by BeingObscene, Wrenzephyr, Unidentified-TF, Vjeol, Balile, Luxianne, AcuteGabby, and other talented transformation artists.

The demo ends shortly after entering the desert or jungle regions, about a third of the total trail length.

New features exclusive to Exile of Aphrodisia 2023:


Cursed artifacts! These are very valuable items worth a lot of money to certain merchants, but keeping them with them presents its own sets of ever-growing risks! Will you risk it?
World map! See the continent of Aphrodisia with 18 hexagon-tile maps spanning the complete journey from east to west. Demo has 1 out of 5.
Player perks! Select up to three player perks to gather more food along the trail, gain the favor of the gods and goddesses, augment party members' skills, increase the amount of food your livestock produce, and more.



Please be aware The Exile of Aphrodisia 2023 is an 18+ adult game for mature players with fetish content revolving around transformation concepts include transgender transformations both male to female and female to male, inanimate transformations (such as statues or clothes), absorption (someone merging into another's body to become a particular body part), shrinking, growing, bodyswapping, mind control, transformation into animals, bimbofication, soft vore, and more. These tags can be enabled to disabled to tailor what content appears in the game to what you are interest in or wish to skip altogether.

content_descriptors.notes: The Exile of Aphrodisa is strictly for players age 18 and up. The game contains nudity and mature themes including written and graphical depictions of sexual acts, bondage, enslavement, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol use, masturbation, bimbofication, transformation into inanimate objects, and more.

name: The Exile of Aphrodisia (2023) Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: [18+] Guide the last of humanity across the vast, magical, danger-filled island of Aphrodisia to Niu Heym, the City of the Gate, before demons enslave them... but only if you can keep them--and yourself-- from being transformed along the way! Inspired by The Oregon Trail and The Odyssey.
